title: 谁有Guilds的汉化文本

replies.author: Forever永恒
replies.txt_content: http://mcbbs.tvt.im/forum.php?mo ... B61%5D%5Btype%5D%3D这个是1.7的汉化插件版，内附有汉化，如果不会用我会在下面贴上汉化文件

replies.author: Forever永恒
replies.txt_content:
